acceptOffer(address,uint256,address,uint.details: Zero address for _currency means that the offer being accepted is in ether.

params._amount: Amount the offer was for/and is being accepted.
params._currencyAddress: Address of the currency used for the offer.
params._originContract: Contract of the asset the offer was made on.
params._splitAddresses: Addresses to split the sellers commission with.
params._splitRatios: The ratio for the split corresponding to each of the addresses being split with.

buy(address,uint256,address,uint256).details: Covers use of any currency (0 address is eth).Need to verify that the buyer (if not using eth) has the marketplace approved for _currencyContract.Need to verify that the seller has the marketplace approved for _originContract.

params._amount: Amount the piece if being bought for (excluding marketplace fee).
params._currencyAddress: Currency address of asset being used to buy.
params._originContract: Contract address for asset being bought.

offer(address,uint256,address,uint256,bo.details: Notice we need to verify that the msg sender has approved us to move funds on their behalf.Covers use of any currency (0 address is eth)._amount is the amount of the offer excluding the marketplace fee.There can be multiple offers of different currencies, but only 1 per currency.

params._convertible: If the offer can be converted into an auction
params._currencyAddress: Address of the token being offered.
params._originContract: Contract address of the asset being listed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeSalePrice(address,uint256,address).details: Sale prices could still exist for different currencies.Sale prices could still exist for different targets.Zero address for _currency means that its listed in ether._target of zero address is the general sale price.

params._originContract: The origin contract of the asset.
params._tokenId: The tokenId of the asset within the _originContract.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setSalePrice(address,uint256,address,uin.details: Covers use of any currency (0 address is eth).Sale price for everyone is denoted as the 0 address.Only 1 currency can be used for the sale price directed at a speicific target._listPrice of 0 signifies removing the list price for the provided currency.This function can be used for counter offers as well.

params._currencyAddress: Contract address of the currency asset is being listed for.
params._listPrice: Amount of the currency the asset is being listed for (including all decimal points).
params._originContract: Contract address of the asset being listed.
params._splitAddresses: Addresses to split the sellers commission with.
params._splitRatios: The ratio for the split corresponding to each of the addresses being split with.
params._target: Address of the person this sale price is target to.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

buy(address,uint256,address,uint256).notice: Purchases the token for the current sale price.

cancelOffer(address,uint256,address).notice: Cancels an existing offer the sender has placed on a piece.

offer(address,uint256,address,uint256,bo.notice: Place an offer for a given asset

removeSalePrice(address,uint256,address).notice: Removes the current sale price of an asset for _target for the given currency.

setSalePrice(address,uint256,address,uin.notice: Sets a sale price for the given asset(s) directed at the _target address.
